articles.image_title: Head of Emperor Augustus from a colossal bronze statue, an example of the highly skilled workmanship characteristic of Greek craftsmen. Place of Origin: Meroe, Sudan H:47.75cm. Material Size: Bronze with marble & glass eyes. Credit Line: Werner Forman Archive/ British Museum, London . Location: 09.
